get_assemblies
==============

.. contents:: **Table of Contents**
    :backlinks: none

Installation
------------

get_assemblies is distributed on `PyPI <https://pypi.org>`_ as a universal
wheel and is available on Linux/macOS and Windows and supports Python 3.7+.

.. code-block:: bash

    $ pip install -U get_assemblies
